sentence.Network_en: At this time of year the Limpopo is dry, making it easy to cross by foot.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在这个时候,林波波河出现了干旱情况, 这也就使得步行过河轻而易举.

means.word_mean: 1. an African river; flows into the Indian Ocean
